verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The crown that my King wore was made of thorns His jewels were bright rubies of blood His royal apparel designed with a scourge Leaving bright crimson stripes on his holy trail{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And Oh oh oh oh oh he wore it so well My King's apparel He wore it so well And Oh oh oh oh oh he wore it so well My King's apparel He wore it so well{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His jewelry was nails in His hands and feet No throne He hung from a sinful tree His royal carpet was blood in the sand “Crucify Jesus” we sinners demand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And Oh oh oh oh oh he wore it so well My King's apparel He wore it so well And Oh oh oh oh oh he wore it so well My King's apparel He wore it so well{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His life for the sinners He willingly gave They lay my Savior in a cold, dark cave But Jesus was righteous was never death’s slave My almighty King conquered death and the grave!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And Oh oh oh oh oh he wore it so well My King's apparel He wore it so well And Oh oh oh oh oh he wore it so well My King's apparel He wore it so well{/lang-eng}
